docs.lead_paragraph: The move to ban polycarbonate infant bottles is the first action taken by any government against bisphenol-a, a chemical that has induced long-term changes in animals exposed to it.

headline.main: Canada Takes Steps to Ban Most Plastic Baby Bottles
headline.print_headline: Canada Takes Steps to Ban Most Plastic Baby Bottles

docs.snippet: The move to ban polycarbonate infant bottles is the first action taken by any government against bisphenol-a, a chemical that has induced long-term changes in animals exposed to it.

docs.lead_paragraph: At a time when people are fretting about toxins in baby bottles and prescription drugs in the water supply, a new report shows that our pets are teeming with chemicals as well.
docs.abstract: Our companion animals are teeming with chemicals, but does it really matter?
docs.snippet: Our companion animals are teeming with chemicals, but does it really matter?

docs.lead_paragraph: The move to ban polycarbonate infant bottles is the first action taken by any government against bisphenol-a, a chemical that has induced long-term changes in animals exposed to it.

headline.main: Canada Bans Plastic Bottles Tied to Health Concerns
headline.print_headline: Canada Bans Bottles With Plastic Tied to Health Concerns

docs.snippet: The move to ban polycarbonate infant bottles is the first action taken by any government against bisphenol-a, a chemical that has induced long-term changes in animals exposed to it.
